==== About ====
  {*} It's the body that keeps all parts of community together and above a certain level of activity.

  {*} It's rather a glue-body more than a governing one that only interjects when some conflict becomes unresolvable through ordinary community discussion

  {*} It's the group of persons responsible for studying then introducing changes in the process to the wide community to accept or refuse.
